tooltip.andromeda.rose_of_the_valley: The smell reminds you of a valley
tooltip.andromeda.incubator[0]: A handy little device that is helpful for hatching eggs.
andromeda.container.guarded: Can't open! The container is guarded!
commands.andromeda.damage.invulnerable: Target is invulnerable to the given damage type
config.andromeda.title: Andromeda (%s)
andromeda.disconnected.module_mismatch:
Andromeda module mismatch!
Disable: %s
 Enable: %s
To join this server!
andromeda.config.tooltip.environment.bot: Required on both Client and Server.
andromeda.config.tooltip.origin: Taken from or based on %s by %s
andromeda.config.tooltip.game_rule: This option is a default for a game rule!
config.andromeda.world.auto_planting.@To: If possible, crops will plant themselves after some time.
config.andromeda.world.auto_planting.opt: Should the list below act as blacklist
Block/Allow the following items to auto-plant.
Pretty self-explanatory. Makes Bee Nests fall after some time, 
you can also shoot them with an arrow
Plants will no longer grow in every biome, and instead require their native temperatures.
So desert cacti will no longer grow in ice sheets, etc.
config.andromeda.world.quick_fire.@Toolt: Makes fire spread a lot faster and wider.
config.andromeda.world.moist_control.@To: Enables some control over farmland moisture.
config.andromeda.blocks.guarded_loot.@To: Block players from opening unlooted containers if there are any monsters nearby.
config.andromeda.blocks.falling_propagul: Fully grown, hanging propagule will fall after some time.
config.andromeda.blocks.cactus_bottle_fi:
Allows filling glass bottles using cacti. 
The top cactus breaks and drops a dead bush after 3 usages.
config.andromeda.blocks.incubator.@Toolt:
Various Incubator settings 
Some options say they require a restart, when they actually don't 
I'm not sure what's going on with that
config.andromeda.blocks.incubator.option: Makes incubator hatch times more random
config.andromeda.blocks.better_fletching: Gives the Fletching Table a GUI where you can tighten the string of your bow for improved accuracy.
config.andromeda.blocks.bed.unsafe.@Tool:
Makes beds explode in every dimension. 
Conflicts with Safe Beds!
config.andromeda.blocks.bed.power.option: Configurable bed explosion power. Default is 5.0
config.andromeda.blocks.bed.safe.@Toolti:
Makes beds not explode when outside the Overworld. 
Conflicts with Beds Explode Everywhere!
config.andromeda.blocks.campfire_effects: Makes campfires emit potion effects within a certain range.
If off, effects will only apply to players
List of effects you want the campfire to emit
Sets a range for campfire to emit effects
config.andromeda.blocks.leaf_slowdown.@T:
Makes entities slower while standing on leaves. 
This should discourage players from running above all the fun things
config.andromeda.entities.zombie.clean_p:
Prevents zombies from picking up garbage with no use. 
Useful items include: tools, armor, any throwable item (if enabled) and the "andromeda:zombies_pickup" tag.
config.andromeda.entities.zombie.all_pic: All Zombies Can Pick up Items
Allows all zombies to pick up items, no matter the difficulty.
config.andromeda.entities.snowball_tweak: Makes snowballs extinguish damaged entities, if on fire.
Snowballs will melt if set on fire.
Snowballs will freeze water and build up snow layers on hit.
Small slimes flee from their enemies.
Larger slimes will merge with smaller ones.
Small slimes slow their enemies on attack.
config.andromeda.entities.bee_flower_dup:
When a bee pollinates a flower, the flower has a chance to spread, similar to grass. 
This won't happen every pollination, since there's a 3-6 minute cooldown.
Enables bee flower duplication for tall flowers, and disables bonemealing tall flowers.
config.andromeda.entities.villagers_foll: Makes villagers follow if you have an emerald block in hand.
config.andromeda.entities.better_furnace:
A few tweaks to make furnace minecarts just a bit better: 
- Carts can now store more fuel. You can change the fuel limit below. 
- You can now use any type of fuel, such as lava buckets, coal blocks, etc.
Set the maximum allowed fuel for the furnace minecart. The default is 45000, and the maximum limit is 2147483647.

Makes furnace minecarts take fuel from nearby inventory carts, 
such as minecarts with chests, hoppers and possibly modded ones. 
If a cart has stopped, you have to push it with your hand before it moves.
config.andromeda.entities.minecart_speed:
Enables some basic control over minecart speed!
This module does not adjust the physics in any way!
 Look into Audaki Cart Engine if you need something more advanced.
Same as above, but for furnace minecarts!

Make furnace mincarts consume more fuel every tick. 
 0 - default, -1 - infinite fuel
config.andromeda.entities.minecarts.@Too: Enable or disable new minecarts with blocks!
config.andromeda.entities.minecarts.opti: Works the same way normal note blocks do
config.andromeda.entities.boats.@Tooltip: Allows you to enable or disable new boats
config.andromeda.entities.boats.option.i: I can't believe this – a furnace minecart on water!
Very unstable, explodes on any collision
Never get bored while sailing across the ocean again!
The long awaited chest boat is now in the game!
config.andromeda.items.tooltips.option.c: Shows in-game time inside clock's tooltip.
config.andromeda.items.tooltips.option.r: Shows distance to last death spot.
config.andromeda.items.lockpick.@Tooltip: Creative-only item, which allows opening things that you shouldn't.
config.andromeda.items.lockpick.option.b: Breaks the lockpick after a successful break-in
config.andromeda.items.magnet.@Tooltip:
A special magnet which attracts selected items. 
Can be upgraded using Heart of the Sea.
config.andromeda.items.infinite_totem.@T: Infinite Totem settings. Please see the wiki for more info.
config.andromeda.items.infinite_totem.op: Enables ascension of "Totem of Undying" to infinity. Otherwise, there's no way to make IToUs.
Makes mending a bit less overpowered by making it remove the "Too Expensive" error instead of repairing items via XP. 
Also sets anvil's XP cap to 40 levels (but not really!). 
Inspired by TheMisterEpic's "This Minecraft Enchantment has been BROKEN for 3 YEARS..." video.
config.andromeda.items.minecart_block_pi: Allows players to "pick" blocks via minecarts

Allows players to "pick" spawners 
Spawner minecart must be enabled to use this!
config.andromeda.items.pouches.@Tooltip:
A collection of plant-themed pouches!
Most pouches can be bought from the Farmer.
config.andromeda.items.pouches.option.sp:
The loot in this pouch is defined by the 'CustomLootId' nbt entry.
Default loot is seeds.
config.andromeda.bugfixes.advancement_sh:
You know that shadow in the advancements menu when you hover over any advancement? 
Now it won't speed up/slowdown when your frame rate changes.
config.andromeda.bugfixes.aligned_altern: Recipe groups won't look janky when there are a lot of recipes in a group.
config.andromeda.mechanics.villager_gift: Allows to restore some reputation by giving gifts to villagers!
Makes the End Crystals respawn after exploding (~1,6 - 3 minutes)

Changes dragons health according to the maximum amount of players in the end. 
The formula is floor((sqrt(500 * i)) * 10), where i is max players
Changes the crystal tracking range from 32 to 24 blocks
config.andromeda.mechanics.throwable_ite: Allows throwing certain items, which would otherwise be useless*
Block all behaviors of items with following IDs
Allows zombies to throw items with behaviors.
In addition to the cooldown, zombies have an interval between throws.
config.andromeda.mechanics.trading_goat_:
Every 2 days you can blow the "sing" horn to summon a wandering trader. 
Please note, wandering traders will still spawn naturally. 
You can disable the "doTraderSpawning" gamerule if you don't want them to
config.andromeda.gui.name_tooltips.@Tool: Shows item's tooltip instead of name above the hotbar
config.andromeda.gui.no_more_adventure.@: Removes "Adventure Mode" from the gamemode switcher
config.andromeda.gui.gui_particles.@Tool: Sprinkle a little particles on your GUIs
config.andromeda.gui.gui_particles.optio: X velocity of Creative Screen Particles
config.andromeda.gui.item_frame_tooltips: Enables in-world tooltips for item frames.
config.andromeda.misc.damage_backport.@T: A backport of the /damage command. Not a 1-1 copy!
config.andromeda.misc.translations.@Tool: Try to download latest translations from GitHub.
config.andromeda.misc.recipe_advancement: Tries to automatically generate recipe advancements for most recipes.
Players must find all items in the recipe before it unlocks in the recipe book.
Ignore Recipes Hidden in the Recipe Book
Does not generate advancements for recipe types hidden in the recipe book.
Does not generate advancements for recipes with certain namespaces (part of an ID before ":").
Does not generate advancements for recipes with certain IDs.
config.andromeda.misc.minor_inconvenienc: Makes the player explode after taking any damage.
config.andromeda.base.option.sideOnlyMod: Disables all modules which require Andromeda to be present on server.
config.andromeda.base.option.sendCrashRe:
Data sent at crash: 
- Environment (e.g. client), 
- OS version (e.g. Windows 11), 
- Platform (e.g. Fabric), 
- Java (e.g. 17 Oracle Corp), 
- Bootstrap status (e.g Discovery), 
- Certain loaded mods. 
Crash reports don't have a unique profile attached.
config.andromeda.base.option.debugMessag: If enabled, log messages could get spammy.
